block.name: Local oscillator (CCSDS)
block.doc:
Message controlled local oscillator
Rotates the incomming samples by a fixed phase increase per sample. The amount of phase increase can be changed by messages with the new phase increase. The processing is done blockwhise and per each block the most recent set phase increase is used.
Block length: Number of symbols (not samples!) that should be processed as one block.
Oversampling factor: Number of samples per symbol. This information is used to define the block length in samples and to scale the frequency estimates from per symbol difference to per sample difference.
